title: "Fame" font - hand lettered {David Thometz}
content:
I need help id'ing the font us for FAME   
   
go to www.members.aol.com/rikeswon/scarf2\_b.jpg   
   
   
thank you.   
   
You can also email me @ [rikeswon@aol.com](mailto:rikeswon@aol.com)
author: samiam1973

comments.content:
I think this is almost certainly a hand-lettered custom job rather than a font.   
   
There are a handful of script fonts that are reasonably close. Try going to:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/Search?what=fonts&searchtext=script](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504011442/http:/www.myfonts.com/Search?what=fonts&searchtext=script)   
   
and browse through the script options. You may find a suitable substitute. Good luck!   
   
David
